Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock

Locking facility used to control access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeLockerSerializationNames Defines constants for AeLockerSerializer and AeLockerDeserializer.
IAeVariableLockCallback Callback interface for reporting that an object's request for locking of one or more variables has been successful.
IAeVariableLocker Describes a facility for locking access to variables in order to support the concept of serializable scopes.
 

Class Summary
AeExclusiveLockRequest Extension of the base lock request that will only acquire the lock if it's the only lock holder present.
AeLockerDeserializer Implements deserialization for a variable locker.
AeLockerSerializer Implements variable locker serialization.
AeLockHolder Impl of the lock holder interface that allows multiple owners
AeLockRequest Describes the request for a variable locking.
AeNoopVariableLocker Noop variable locker, does nothing and is used when no serializable scopes are present.
AeSharedLockRequest A request for a shared lock on a variable.
AeVariableLocker Provides a locking facility for use in controlling access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock Description

Locking facility used to control access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.
